title: 101 вопрос взрослому
overview: 101 вопрос взрослому is a talk show in which an adult hero answers questions from children from 9 to 17 years old. Communication is moderated by the presenter, whose voice sounds off-screen. Children's spontaneity, sincerity and lack of fear to ask an uncomfortable question to a famous person - the conversation will turn out to be very bright and interesting!
